title: The Big Push Infrastructure Programme
description: Transformative investment in roads, railways, airports, ports, digital infrastructure, and energy

title: 24-Hour Economy
description: Industrial parks, incentives for night operations, job creation through shift work

title: Free Tertiary Education
description: No academic fees for Ghanaian students in public universities

title: 1 Million Jobs Programme
description: Targeted job creation in digital, agriculture, manufacturing, and tourism

title: Accra-Kumasi Expressway
description: Completion of dual carriageway as part of Big Push

title: Digital Ghana Agenda Phase 2
description: Free Wi-Fi in schools, digital ID, e-governance expansion

title: Modernising Agriculture
description: Mechanisation, irrigation, storage, Planting for Export and Rural Development (PERD)

title: Agenda 111 Hospitals Completion
description: Full completion of all 111 district hospitals
